text: Been watching news unfold since afternoon, cant imagine how worse this would have been had it collapsed during peak hour #BridgeCollapse
#BridgeCollapse Henry Laas says they are working with dept of labour but can't speculate on what happened. Apologises to road users
Why are we not talking about the  incompetence of Murray & Roberts & co Like we always do with BEE firms. #BridgeCollapse #GraystonBridge
